name: Rain's Song
description:
Dramatic story game.In this game you can use your soldiers and let them  help you

in the middle of a battlefield.Game has 1boss 2 secret rooms 1secret boss and normal chapter.

Game is not that long so please play till to end.

Guide:

Button icon means its interactable.

For stones: call your soldiers and press e to lift it

For covers: press E to take cover

For Secret rooms: When you see a little radio icon at the right of screen,that means you can do something interactable with radio . Who knows Sometimes it can be a Secret Room!

QTE: Press the buttons on the screen to resume to animation.
